en.dado_greaterthan_sheet: Dado must be less than sheet thickness
en.exceed_max_sheet: Sheet thickness must be less than or equal to
en.exceed_min_sheet: Sheet thickness must be greater than or equal to
en.exceed_min_dado: Dado thickness must be greater than or equal to
en.exceed_recommended_dado_width: Dado thickness should be 20% of sheet thickness or greater than
en.exceed_recommended_dado_depth: Dado depth should be 80% of sheet thickness or less than
